spec.timing_notes: Breathing rhythm aligned with cubic-bezier(0.16, 1, 0.3, 1) - inhale (frames 0-3) builds tension geometrically, exhale (frames 4-7) releases with biological urgency
keyframe_descriptions: frame 0: Thin hexagonal wireframe in #00D9FF, 16px diameter, sharp vertices
frame 1: Hexagon expands to 24px, inner triangle appears, brightness +20%
frame 2: Sacred geometry emerges - hexagon + triangle + central dot, 32px diameter
frame 3: Peak crystalline form - multiple nested shapes, maximum #00D9FF intensity
frame 4: Color corruption begins - outer edges shift to #FF4500, geometry wavers
frame 5: Biological takeover - shapes become organic, pulsing with #FF4500 dominance
frame 6: Cellular division aesthetic - form splits/multiplies, orange overwhelms blue
frame 7: Return to frame 0 but with subtle orange 'stain' - the corruption spreads
spec.composition: Centered mandala with high contrast against dark background, designed to read clearly at 64x64 while maintaining geometric precision
spec.technical_notes: Alpha channel for clean compositing over gameplay, ensure geometric edges remain crisp at target resolution
spec._creative_direction: Transform metamorphosis from mere gameplay mechanic into crystalline harbinger of inevitable doom—a geometric mandala that breathes with biological dread, pulsing from electric clarity to corrupted emergence.
spec._justification: Rather than a simple glow, this creates a visual language of transformation that embodies the vision's core insight: magnificent catastrophe through geometric precision. The mandala form suggests both cellular division and arcane ritual, while the color transition from player-blue to enemy-orange visualizes the corruption process itself.
